mapper.insert: insert into tbl_testboard(bno, title, content, writer, pw) values(seq_TestBoard.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pw} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_TestBoard where bno > 0 order by bno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_TestBoard set readcount = readcount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_TestBoard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
